body.header: Questions 12-16. Complete the summary using words in bold at the top of the right hand column. There are more words than spaces, so you will not use them all.

p.font: In this case the summary does not summarise the whole text, but only one section. The first sentence of the summary tells you which section of the text if refers to. Read through the whole summary once before filling in any gaps. Here are some things to consider:

section.p: Questions 12, 13 and 15In both cases the gaps follows the preposition 'in', so the missing words must be places.
Question 14The whole sentence tells you that the missing word refers to something that 'survives', so it must be a living thing.
Question 16This could be a living thing, or evidence of living things.
